item.title: Getting Things Done
item.description: Getting Things Done, or GTD for short, is a system created by [[David Allen]]. The main objective is to manage your task to make sure you work on the right things.

item.title: Keyword Studios
item.description: Keywords Studios is a global technical and creative services provider to the video game industry. The company offers a range of services including [[audio production]], [[localization]], [[testing]], [[engineering]], [[customer support]], and [[art creation]].

item.title: Mighty Games
item.description: Mighty Games Group is a video game development studio based in Melbourne, Australia. The company was founded in 2011 and has since released a number of successful mobile games, including “Shooty Skies,” “Crossy Road,” and “Toy Story Drop!

item.title: âœ… How my personal task management changed over the years?
item.description: Over the years, I tried a lot of tools and system to keep myself to be productive. Some works, some don’t.

item.title: ðŸ‘¨ About me
item.description: Hello! My name is Aditia Dwiperdana. I build Agate, a game development company, with my friends. I started as a programmer, grow into game producer, and involved in talent development.
